keyword: how many calories in a popsicle
title: How Many Calories Are in a Popsicle?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a popsicle, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Popsicle?
assumptions: Standard fruit-flavored frozen popsicle, ~80g, made with fruit juice, water, and sugar; no dairy or artificial additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor, size, ingredients (e.g., cream vs. juice-based), and sweeteners. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical fruit popsicle contains about 80 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a fruit popsicle?
faqs.a: About 80 kcal for a standard 80g fruit-flavored one.
Yes, typically 18g sugars per popsicle from fruit juice and added sweeteners.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories between juice and cream popsicles?
faqs.a: Juice-based are ~80 kcal; cream versions add 50-100 kcal from fat and dairy.

faqs.q: Do popsicles have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: Negligibleâ€”0g protein and fat in standard fruit popsicles.
Sugar-free options are around 40 kcal, using artificial sweeteners instead.
